item.title: ESRI ArcGIS Data Store
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/arcgis-enterprise/administration/arcgis-software-and-cve-2021-44228-aka-log4shell-aka-logjam/ https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/arcgis-enterprise/administration/arcgis-software-and-cve-2021-44228-aka-log4shell-aka-logjam/ Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Requires script remediation. ESRI has created scripts to remove the JndiLookup class, but has not issued patches to upgrade the Log4j versions CISAGov Last Update: 12/17/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:04:10 CISAGov Updated vendorPatchExists.
